entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Circular DI causes endless loop instead of exception #105900
  • [API Proposal]: Nullable.Create #105897
  • System.IO.Packaging.dll is not needed in System.IO.Packaging package for net462 target #105896
  • Blazor WASM applications on net8.0 freeze on startup on iOS 18 Beta 4 (22A5316j) when built with AOT #105893
  • Support Nullable DateOnly and Nullable TimeOnly in JsonSerializer #105892
  • NativeAOT (net9.0) error on linux-bionic-arm/arm64 #105880
  • fail: DevToolsProxy #105881
  • [API Proposal]: Implement `ISpanFormattable` on `StringBuilder` #105870
  • NullReferenceException in System.Net.HttpConnection.get_LocalEndPoint #105865
  • SDK test ILLink_verify_analysis_warnings_framework_assemblies fails after #105766 #105857
    9.0.0

Closed

  • JIT: Assertion failed '!varTypeIsMask(tree)' during 'Linear scan register alloc' #105623
    9.0.0
  • Improve host test usability #3151
    Future
  • Add tests to verify framework-dependent apphost #3098
    Future
  • Dotnet muxer doesn't respect Windows symlinks #83314
    Future
  • `TypeLoadException` has no message when issued from a single file app #92111
    9.0.0
  • Module.ScopeName returns `appname.dll` for single-file apps #56519
    9.0.0
  • JIT: VN does not encode base type for `CreateScalar` #105721
    9.0.0
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpMetricsTest_Http20.AllSocketsHttpHandlerCounters_Success_Recorded item comparison failure #101285
    9.0.0
  • HostedService does not capture current SynchronizationContext #94252
    9.0.0
  • IConfiguration.Get<T>() has unexpect result with array property/field with init data. #105855
  • FileSystemWatcher Notifications / Wait for Completion #73746
    Future
  • ARM64-SVE: Summary blocks contain incorrect instructions #105796
  • JIT: Assertion failed '(op2->GetRegNum() != targetReg) || (op1Reg == targetReg)' during 'Generate code' #105821
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 6 System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests Regressions #102203
    9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] `JSImport.CreateFunctionInternal` test fails #105863
  • [wasm] `JsImportResolvedPromiseReturnsCompletedTask` is resolved faster than we start awaiting it in test #105861
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Consider adding JsonDocument.TryParse(), Take 2 #82605
    Future
  • [AOT] In special generate argument, the aot application will crash #105397
    9.0.0
  • [WASM][aot] System.Tests.UriCreateStringTests.Path_Query_Fragment #105823
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix some core type references #105903
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Initialize RuntimeEventSource as part of coreclr_initialize instead of only when running an app #105902
    area-Host
  • Move exposed module object from `DomainAssembly` to `Module` #105901
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Removing incomplete mono debugger experiment #105899
  • Fix dump generation on background threads #105898
    Servicing-consider, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Fix EventListenerThreadPool test #105895
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Fix field offset not being set for 0-offset #105894
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Try Fix Cpu Usage Test #105891
    area-System.Runtime, 9.0.0
  • Ensure we consistently broadcast the result of simd dot product #105888
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • treat USEASG as use followed by def in liveness #105887
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: Generate FMA uses in the correct order #105723 #105885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Provide System.Formats.Asn1 package readme #105882
    area-System.Formats.Asn1, community-contribution
  • [WASI] timers based on wasi:clocks #105879
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • Consider methods returning constants same as substitutions #105878
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Fix stack trace iteration over exceptions #105877
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Obsolete ExchangeAlgorithmType, CipherAlgorithmType and HashAlgorithmType and their usage #105875
    area-System.Net.Security, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [mono] Fail on LLVM version mismatch and add instructions for updating #105873
    area-Build-mono
  • [WIP] Re-enable Linux Bionic x64 library tests #105872
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Do not emit unsupported thunks for delegates with `allows ref struct` generics #105871
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Test llvm bump #105867
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Add GetKeyedService overload with Type #105860
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Don't use ZR as target in LSE atomics #105854
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • MemoryCache - Remove unhandled exception handler #105853
    area-System.Runtime.Caching, 9.0.0
  • MemoryCache - Remove unhandled exception handler. #105852
    area-System.Runtime.Caching, new-api-needs-documentation
  • MemoryCache - Remove unhandled exception handler. #105851
    area-System.Runtime.Caching, new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • Ensure that we are correctly typing simd comparison nodes #105883
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Added SVE GetFfr, SetFfr, LoadVectorFirstFaulting, GatherVectorFirstFaulting #105595
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Fix Runtime_105821 ISA check #105889
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Encode SIMD base type in VN for all HW intrinsics #105869
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix legacy exception handling dump generation on background threads #105830
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Add cross-linking between guidance files #105884
    area-Meta
  • [HTTP/2] Move away marking idle/non-idle from HttpConnectionPool #105876
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Sync shared code from aspnetcore #105765
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Simplified muxer fix #99576
    area-Host
  • ARM64-SVE: Fix API summary blocks #105796 #105864
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix overzealous assert in `CodeGen::genSSE42Intrinsic` #105833
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the case 'ReadyToRunHelperId.ResolveVirtualFunction' in LoongArch64ReadyToRunHelperNode.cs. #105858
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • [browser] Disable InterpPGO test #105874
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Remove short branches #105386
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Revert "Use IndexOf for bounded loops in a regex code gen" #105735
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 9.0.0
  • Use ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull in more places #105380
    area-System.Runtime, 9.0.0
  • Emit instantiated types as external references if possible #105816
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Convert exception throwing JIT helpers to managed code. #105671
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2507770 #105829
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Update IncrementingPollingCounter only on Timer thread #105548
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Fix copy constructor injection for unsafe value classes #105779
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Implement ARM32 atomic intrinsics #97792
    arch-arm32, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Clean up DiagnosticContext #105848
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add/update AssemblyBuilder/PersistedAssemblyBuilder tests covering boundary / edge case scenarios #105782
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Respect general-purpose bit flags when decoding ZipArchiveEntry names and comments #103271
    area-System.IO.Compression, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [cdac] Implement ISOSDacInterface::GetObjectData getting COM RCW/CCW #105846
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Error out when struct size is bigger than int.MaxValue #104393
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • JIT: Fix over-shifting logic when constant-folding `AdvSimd.ShiftRight*` and `AdvSimd.ShiftLeft*` #105847
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixed creating generic type with abstract type when it is has a default constractor constrant #101963
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Heap snapshot system for WASM #105713
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono
  • Run native aot runtime tests on cet compatible machines #105288
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [DRAFT] JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.LoadVector*FirstFaulting APIs #104964
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • JIT: Make sure static ctor flag check uses a volatile load #105832
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Return null instead of throwing in ServiceDescriptor.ImplementationInstance\Type\Factory if a keyed service #105776
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 9.0.0
  • Add WebSocket Keep-Alive Ping and Timeout (minimal) implementation #105841
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add support for doubly nested intrinsic classes #105761
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [DRAFT] More TypeName APIs #103713
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, binary-serialization
  • Re-enable trimming of library tests on Apple mobile #104097
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Use `in` on `Unsafe.AreSame` callsites #105000
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Fix opt value for an embedded intrinsic in ConditionalSelect (#105720) #105803
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Increment nested depth in TooDeepJsonDocument test by 10x #105836
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Pass content length into limited streams as Int64 #105481
    area-System.Net
  • Fixed a broken build with STRESS_DYNAMIC_HEAP_COUNT enabled #105507
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [browser] Remove check for user agent when attaching debugger #105559
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Fix AOT targeting .NET 6 #105805
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • TransferEncoding chunked testing only if it is last header value #105647
    area-System.Net.Http
  • add new JsonIgnoreAttribute WhenWriting/WhenReading #104562
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Fix conditional select for Zeroing predicates #102904 #105737
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Avoid scanning isinst checks when building whole program view #104148
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Partial re-revert of #104336. Only JIT fixes are included. #105596
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ActivatorUtilities: Do not wrap Delegate.Invoke in another delegate #105814
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Assign latest virtual timestamp for added node to enable LRU manner of RegexCache #105746
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • JIT: Keep delegate object alive during invoke #105099
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Added a fix for an incorrect assumption of an assertion failure re: failure to decommit. #105849
    area-GC-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-02
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] support `System.Net.Http.HttpClient` on WASIp2 #2614
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add a native WASM object writer #2643
  • Infrastructure for swift entry point demangling #2639

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add `dotnet new consoledi` project template #42517
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.7.24379.15] Fail to build CleanArchitecture2 app with an error "CS0619:'MudMenu.OffsetY' is obsolete: 'Use AnchorOrigin or TransformOrigin instead.'" #42509
  • Reenable Crossgen Tests #42506
  • Running aspire project with only SDK 9.0 P6 / 9.0 P7 fails: "You must install or update .NET to run this application." #42505

Closed

  • Make it easier to work with the SDK components and installers #23357
    9.0.1xx
  • Not specifying a value for the --launch-profile option of `dotnet run` results in InvalidOperationException #25867
    9.0.1xx
  • Merge installer repo into SDK #24415
    9.0.1xx
  • Would it be possible to pick a fix for https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/pull/2671? #28547
    9.0.1xx
  • Redistribute the portable RID graph from the Microsoft.NETCore.Platforms transport package #35750
    9.0.1xx
  • Merge .net format repo into SDK or roslyn repos #35915
    9.0.1xx
  • Figure out which package other repos should use to subscribe to the sdk version #41156
    9.0.1xx
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.7.24379.15] Fail to build grandnode2 app with source generate file errors and unexpected RZ1031&CS0102 errors #42510
  • [NETSDKE2E]Publish blazorwasm project failed with clang.exe-System Error "The code execution cannot proceed because MSVCP140.dll" was not found... #42147

PullRequests

Created

  • Drop FirstTimeMessageAspNetCertificateLinux #42519
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #42518
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add PGO for F# compiler #42514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Find all workloads! Even if they're in another feature band Fixes #42502 #42513
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Replace obsolete nuget api in Microsoft.DotNet.PackageValidation #42508
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Update Skip Attribute to Issue Link for Crossgen Tests #42507
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Exclude bincore directory in diff test #42498
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Workload set garbage collection #42475
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • fix: Don't fail metadata updates on missing assemblies #40725
    untriaged
  • Enable specifying install search location options for published `apphost` #42455
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Sidestep telemetry null writing by writing empty strings #42499
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Enable tab-completion for nuget package versions #42349
    Area-NuGet, Area-CLI, cli-ux
  • Handle Test Information from the New Testing Platform #42494
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Add code to containers check to allow users to silence it #42501
    untriaged, Area-Containers

entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion "User-defined Positional Patterns" #1047

PullRequests

Updated

  • Update first-class Span speclet #8312

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-02
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Backing field symbol for record with a primary constructor in a referenced project is missing #74634
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35201.175 #74636
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.shadowDebug-35201.55 #74635

Updated

  • Allow for a way to ensure some source generators run before / after others #57239
    Backlog
  • Reduce the size of the MSBuildWorkspace BuildHost directories #70945

PullRequests

Created

  • Support attributes targeting synthesized backing field #74641
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Narrow EA dependency #74640
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP #74638
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Use auto properties #74637
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Add Solution.WithProjectInfo API #74289
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Disallow span conversions between spans which are not structs #74587
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types

Updated

  • SynthesizedHotReloadExceptionSymbol #74625
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Update 'use auto property' to support using the `field` keyword #74629
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Implement remaining span conversions #74420
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Improve error recovery for null coalescing assignment operator #74218
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Erase extension types eagerly during translation of type symbols to Cci entities. #74576
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Avoid duplicate synthesized interface members #73730
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Use manual `foreach` instead of `AddRange` method for certain collection expression spreads #74630
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Add support in DevKit for source link go to definition #74626
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Quarantine `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.E2ETest.Tests.RoutingTest.NavigationLock_CanBlockExternalNavigation` and friends #57153
  • Rate limiting middleware for AspNet/Kestrel #57152
  • Reduce error level of `blazor.web.js` does not exist errors #57149
  • Intermittent Error on Build #57147
  • Shared project files marked as content are inconsistent on debug and after being published on Blazor WebAssembly Standalone App. #57146
  • @microsoft SignalR 8.0.9. Failed to resolve module specifier "module". Relative references must start with either "/", "./", or "../" #57145
  • NullReferenceException invoking superclass method, seems "this" disappeared #57144
  • Blazor Wasm different output between build and publish #57143
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.7.24379.15] Fail to launch SPOTClient app after retargeting it to .NET 9.0 with error: Microsoft.JSInterop.JSException: Could not find 'PlatformHelpers.initSearchInputFocus' #57138
  • [WebToolsE2E] Run .exe/.dll file with error "An exception occurred while trying to decrypt the element." from publish folder after publishing .NET 9.0 Razor/MVC/Blazor web app project. #57137

Closed

  • Installer of aspnetcore still contains wrong outdated .NET dotnet license information that makes it problematic to distribute #54434
    9.0-preview6
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, fortunes_dapper #57093
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, json #57134
  • Perf regression: json #57135
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • Figure out a way to update the Swashbuckle.AspNetCore version used in project templates on a regular cadence #26619
    Backlog
  • How can I use the @rendermode InteractiveServer in the Index.cshtml file? #57113
  • Remove hard code casting #57133

PullRequests

Created

  • Quarantine `CanBlockExternalNavigation` and friends #57154
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor
  • Add some comments to various internal HTTP/2 types #57151
    area-networking
  • Use [DebuggerDisableUserUnhandledExceptions] #57148
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Some of the default UI styling is not accessible in dark mode #57142
    area-blazor
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `5bcb2d7` to `ff233bd` #57140
    area-infrastructure
  • Sync shared code from runtime #57136
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Propagate trace parent to SignalR hub invocations #57049
    area-signalr, 9.0-rc1

Updated

  • Remove unsafe from PathNormalizer #56805
    Perf, community-contribution, area-networking
  • [Blazor][Accessibility] Display placeholders on form elements #57126
    area-mvc
  • [Blazor][Accessibility] Add aria-label to provide alternative text for screen readers #57125
    area-mvc, area-blazor
  • [Blazor][Accessibility] At reflow resolution "Hamburger" control is not visible clearly #57127
    area-mvc
  • Add client span to SignalR .NET client #57101
    area-signalr
  • Ensuring cancellation of tokens when using GetLinkedCancellationToken(a,b) #55968
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add HTML title attribute to "th" elements #55837
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-02
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • TestLogsAllCategoriesDefaultLevelFallback fails frequently #2541
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • dotnet-trace: don't fail if the trace file has no method calls #4827

Merged

  • Don't print wNumVirtuals wNumVtableSlots if they're 0 #4760
  • Allow SOS testing against a private runtime build #4818

Updated

  • Enable new exception handling in .NET 9 SOS testing #4817
    DO NOT MERGE

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Loading Android Apps on the debugger is way too slow #23991
  • Picker ItemDisplayBinding doesn't work with compiled bindings #23989
    .NET 8 SR8
  • MSBuild <Include /> (global using directive) does not work for platform-specific namespaces #23986
  • Can I use webview to intercept a network request? #23982
  • Windows title bar size not changing when text size is changed for accessibility reasons #23980
  • CollectionView header layout issue with grid #23979
  • iOS-Specific enum UIModalPresentationStyle does not support all underlying UIKit options #23975
    Backlog
  • Publishing to BAR/Maestro will no longer support tokens #23974
  • [MAUI]The Edit Recipe page overlaps with the Recipe details page #23973
    9.0-preview7
  • Can't Change Printer in Print Dialog in .Net Maui Blazor Hybrid #23971
  • XamlC error : The given key 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Xaml.ElementNode' was not present in the dictionary. #23970
    9.0-rc1

Closed

  • [iOS] Modernize iOS CollectionView implementation #23613
    9.0-preview7
  • Need the abiltiy to Activate a window from within the program #18477
    9.0-preview7
  • VisualElement.OnMeasure currently routes to some inconsistent logic compared to OnMeasureOverride #23244
    9.0-preview7
  • iOS PostNotifications permission check is always granted #23962
  • Raygun4Maui throws ArgumentNullException in both Android/iOS Release build #23964
  • widgets #23953
  • Unable to deploy WinUI App after updating to 8.0.10, 8.0.14, 8.0.20, or installing VS 17.10 #21744
    Backlog
  • iOS CarouselView crashes with "MauiContext should have been set on parent." #23278
    Backlog
  • [iOS] IndicatorView IndicatorSize Overwritten to Default After Updating ObservableCollection in CarouselView #23508
  • [iOS] button.SetBackgroundImage(image, state) does not work #21265
  • Cannot Publish MAUI App in Intune #17810
  • Splash Screen background does not respect the Color define in MauiSplashScreen #23018
  • Grid height "*" not working inside of nested collection views in iOS #22356

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Skip initial assignments in property mapper (take 3) #23987
    community ✨
  • Fix transparent default modal background #23985
  • Add support for iOS/Mac specific modals styled as popovers #23984
    community ✨
  • Remove the 'Resources' prefix from BundleResource #23978
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview7] Update versions for iOS and sdk #23977
  • [Windows][GestureManager] Unsubscribe control tap events only if they were subscribed #23976
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, t/perf

Updated

  • Implement touch interception for layouts on Android #13725
    area-layout, platform/android 🤖, Backlog
  • MenuItem gets updated when IconImageSource changes - Fix 17210 #18119
    community ✨, area-controls-menubar, stale, t/desktop
  • [Android] Fix shadow scaling issue #17902
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing
  • Fixed CollectionView reordering last item #17825
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, stale
  • [Windows] Allow tap gesture in ContentView #17482
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-gestures
  • [X] don't expand types to Extension for x:Static #17276
    area-xaml, stale
  • [Android] Only return path to font file if it exists, otherwise copy it again. Fixes #16923 #16924
    platform/android 🤖, area-fonts, community ✨
  • Fixed scroll to group item on Android + Windows #16704
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, stale
  • Fix the OnNavigatedTo event and the OnAppearing event to return the ScrollToAsync method call #16619
    community ✨, stale, area-controls-scrollview
  • Null guard in `ShellFlyoutTemplatedContentRenderer.HeaderContainer.UpdateMinimumHeight` #16573
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, stale
  • [Android] Fix default Switch Style #16252
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-templates, area-controls-switch
  • Consolidate all the test handler construction #16200
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, stale
  • Reduce Confusion of DateSelected Event in DatePicker (Split Into DateSelected and DateChanged) #16153
    community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker, stale
  • [iOS] Fix WordWrap not working when Padding is set on Label #16136
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [iOS] Add size update for Shell Popup Overlay after rotation #15866
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Handlers] Make sure to update Content on handlers when the ControlTemplate changes #15656
    area-layout, community ✨, stale
  • Fix DataTrigger behavior that can cause some strange inconsistencies #15655
    area-xaml, community ✨
  • [Android] Allow full screen videos from WebView #15472
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-webview

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Function schema name is lost when AsSplitQuery() is applied #34341
  • Invalid Column Name 'XXX' Exception When Using GroupJoin Without Foreign Key Relationship #34339
  • Have you considered supporting DuckDB? #34336

Closed

  • Cosmos: Use 1:1 mapping for .NET `Id` to JSON `id` unless explicitly configured otherwise #34179
    9.0.0
  • Cosmos no longer supports Dictionary with TValue type of primitive collection #34105
    9.0.0
  • Cosmos: Inherit partition key definition from parent by convention #34176
    9.0.0
  • Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer requires Microsoft.WindowsDesktop.App since 8.0.2 #34331
  • Linq to SQL Query seeking records where date is == to max date returning wrong records #34283

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't implement IModelFinalizingConvention on CosmosJsonIdConvention #34343
  • [release/8.0] Use placeholder value to fix CredScan #34342
    tell-mode
  • Change default embedded discriminator property from "Discriminator" to "$type" #34340
  • Remove migration lock timeout #34338

Merged

  • Stop including the discriminator in the JSON id by default #34208
  • Add back support for Cosmos nested dictionaries #34312
  • Get partition keys, container name, and JsonIdDefinition from the root entity in the hierarchy by default #34252

Updated

  • Introduce UseAzureSynapse and UseAzureSql #34052
  • New EF.Constant handling #34297
  • Handle projections of nested owned entity in Cosmos #34315

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-02
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Upversion two runtime assemblies that are flagged as being old #20038
